main event: A civilian witness spotted a round, white object that turned red when moving over Camp Pon-Tok, Maryland in 1955.
interesting points: The object was initially thought to be a star, but it increased in size and changed color from white to red.
The object remained stationary for about 1 minute.
The sighting occurred after a heavy thunderstorm with clear skies and light winds.
An aircraft was reported in the area about half an hour after the sighting, which was identified as an Air Force jet.
The observer had several other witnesses but their names and addresses were not provided.
sighted object: a round, white object that turned red when moving
photographs: no, the report does not include any photographs
